nodes.text: Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Clones vs. Droids
Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Clones vs. Droids is an online computer game released on starwars.com as part of the campaign advertising the Clone Wars film and TV series

Players can play as either Separatist droid forces or Republic clone troopers. The game is turn based. Each turn lasts 30 seconds. Players have to adjust trajectory and power of the shot of each character. When the time runs out, characters automatically shoot.
